nodes.text: Virile Squadron was a starfighter squadron of the Thyferran Home Defense Corps that served under the government instituted by Xucphra Corporation and headed by former Imperial Intelligence chief Ysanne Isard, flying TIE/LN starfighters.
During the Battle of Thyferra, that marked both the climax and resolution of the Bacta War, Virile Squadron lost ten starfighters on their first pass against Dlarit's former unit, the Rogues.
